data.text:
RPG is one of the most popular video game genres. A lot of people love to play role-playing games because of so many good attributes that role-playing games possess. Some of the best features that you will experience when you play a must-buy RPG are breathtaking worlds, character progression, and new discoveries. Playing this kind of game makes you feel that there is no end. In addition to these key features, there are role-playing games with a unique and interesting magic system. This feature is definitely a game-changer.

What are the best PlayStation 4 role-playing games with a magic system? Each must-buy RPG in this list will give you the best fantasy gaming experience ever! Take a look:

Citadel: Forged With Fire

Dragon’s Dogma: Dark Arisen

Lichdom: Battlemage

Little Witch Academia: Chamber Of Time

Mages Of Mystralia

Magic: Legends

Outward

Spellbreak

If you are ready to immerse yourself in different breathtaking worlds and unravel the story of each must-buy RPG, let us begin this wonderful journey. And later on, we will find out which must-buy RPG is the best role-playing game that matches your playstyle.

Best Role-Playing Games With Magic System

1. Citadel: Forged With Fire

Genre: Role-Playing Game / Sandbox

In Citadel: Forged With Fire, the player will assume to play the role of a newly minted apprentice of the magic arts. The player’s main mission revolves around investigating the world of Ignus. The world has different areas including forests, mountains, plains, swamps, and tundra. In order to unravel successfully the history and secrets of Ignus, the player should visit uncharted territories. Embarking on this journey, the player will meet different allies and enemies. In addition to that, the player will also tame beasts during the exploration.

One of the highlights of the game is magic and spellcasting. The player should master different types of powerful spells which are useful during battles and exploration of the world Ignus. There is a diverse section of weapons in the game. The player can have melee weapons such as a stone head ax, bastion, and bladetooth. Wands are vital for spellcasting. There are different wand options such as heavenglade, cyclone, and pyrant. Each wand has a different purpose. Aside from riding horses and direwolves, the player can fly when traversing into different territories.

2. Dragon’s Dogma: Dark Arisen

Genre: Role-Playing Game / Hack-and-Slash

In this must-buy RPG called Dragon’s Dogma: Dark Arisen, the player will not embark on a journey alone because the player is going to explore the huge open world with AI companions known as Pawns. Having AI companions during battles is very helpful. Pawns can fight independently during battles. What makes this game more interesting is that the AI companions learn abilities from the player.

When it comes to combat experience, the overall gameplay is outstanding. If you are ready to explore the underground realm while tons of terrifying monsters are waiting for you, this is the best game for you. The player will also encounter Hydra which is a monster with 4 heads. In addition to Hydra, there are dragons and other creatures that you will battle throughout your exploration in the underground realm.

3. Lichdom: Battlemage

Genre: Role-Playing Game / Action

Lichdom: Battlemage is a must-buy RPG because it features two outstanding storylines in just one game. The player has an option to choose between the female and male characters. If the player chooses the female character, the story revolves around her sister being abducted by Shax. But if the player chooses the male character, the story revolves around his wife being killed by Shax. Even if the two characters have their own story, Shax remains involved in each story.

The game features a linear world connected by checkpoints. The player can travel from one place to another at the speed of light because of this feature. In terms of the magic system, the player can obtain 3 Sigils that are used to cast magic including ice, lightning, and fire. The player can also craft shields by using offensive spells. One of the shields is Agile Shield that grants the player the ability to teleport in short-ranges. Magic abilities can have a huge impact during battles.

4. Little Witch Academia: Chamber Of Time

Genre: Role-Playing Game / Action / Adventure

Little Witch Academia: Chamber Of Time is a must-buy RPG that you should not miss. In this game, the player will assume to play the role of the protagonist who is currently honing her witch skills. Her name is Akko. The game takes place in Luna Nova Academy which is a magical academy where Akko and her friends are training their witch skills. Unraveling the mysteries in Luna Nova Academy, Akko is accompanied by her friends Amanda, Constanze, Diana, Jasminka, Lotte, and Sucy. You are not alone in this magical journey.

Character progression is present in the game. The in-game character can level up and possess many magic abilities. There are also magic items and special weapons perfect for fantastic combat. Some of these items and weapons are bows, arrows, dual-pronged spear, fishing rod-like weapon, and conjoined twin blades.

5. Mages Of Mystralia

Genre: Role-Playing Game / Action / Adventure

Mages Of Mystralia follows the story of a mage who discovers her magical powers and unintentionally caused chaos in her village. The protagonist’s name is Zia and she was exiled from her own village. She has nowhere to go not until she meets The Mentor who told her to travel to a Mage Sanctuary to master her magical skills. By mastering her magical skills, there is a possibility that she will know how to control them and not cause any turmoil through her powers.

Embarking on this journey, Zia will face tons of powerful evil creatures that will hinder her way to the Mage Sanctuary. Zia is also tasked to stop the war between an Army of Trolls and the Kingdom of Mystralia. There are different locations that you will explore including The Winding Glade, Haven, Mystral Woods, Greyleaf Hamlet, Old Mines, The Highlands, The Rise, and Sky Temple.

6. Magic: Legends

Genre: Role-Playing Game / Action

Magic: Legends is a must-buy RPG because this game features different classes of characters. Each class offers a different kind of playstyle which is great because you can play every class in Magic: Legends and never get tired of it. It feels like every moment is unique and has never been experienced before. The 5 classes in Magic: Legends are Sanctifier, Mind Mage, Necromancer, Geomancer, and Beastcaller.

Sanctifier is known for being a long-range damage dealer. Mind Mage is using psychic powers such as telekinesis when battling with enemies. Necromancer is a mid-range damage dealer. Geomancer’s power comes from the earth and can perform lava melee attacks. Beastcaller can summon beasts and attack enemies with an Aether Fox companion. Just like most role-playing games, the player can gain XP when completing missions. The game is also composed of regions called “Overworld”. These regions are Benalia, Shiv, Tolaria, Tazeem, and Gavony. These regions are composed of a volcanic island, a small tropical island, and a lush jungle continent.

7. Outward

Genre: Role-Playing Game / Adventure

Outward is one of the most challenging role-playing games that you could ever play. Aside from its role-playing elements, the game also possesses a survival feature that takes the gameplay to another level. In addition to dangerous creatures that the in-game character should defeat, the in-game character should also surpass the hazardous environmental conditions present in the game because the in-game character might die because of cold, indigestion, and disease. The player should also monitor the in-game character’s hunger, thirst, and sleep.

The player will explore the world of Aurai. There are various missions to complete while exploring lands and cities. Get ready to encounter the most dangerous creatures while completing missions. In addition to spellcasting, weapons such as main hand, off-hand, and ammo are still present in the game. Some of the main hand weapons are axes, bows, and polearms. While the off-hand weapons are chakrams, daggers, and lanterns. Outward is a must-buy RPG that you should check out right now.

8. Spellbreak

Genre: Role-Playing Game / Battle Royale

Spellbreak is an exhilarating battle royale game with role-playing elements. This is a must-buy RPG that you shouldn’t miss because every single moment is heart-pounding. In this game, the players are fighting against each other inside an arena that slowly shrinks over time. Every player inside the arena has one goal in common and it is to survive.

What makes Spellbreak different from other games is that players use magical spells instead of guns. Imagine firing magical spells to one another — looks magical yet tragic at the same time. There are six classes of magical spells in Spellbreak including fire, ice, water, lightning, stone, and toxic. Some of the spells and sorceries that you can use during battles are ice lance, flash freeze, lightning bolt, lightning strike, fireball, and flamewall. Be the last battle mage standing!
